summary: This document is a suicide watch observation log for inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, beginning on July 23, 2019. It contains chronological entries documenting his behavior and condition in the hours leading up to his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the suicide watch log, being observed in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Suicide watch initiation for Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A suicide watch was initiated for inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, beginning at 1:40 AM.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was placed on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on July 23, 2019, at 1:40 AM.
The log documents frequent observations of Epstein lying on his bed and standing at his cell door in the hours following the watch's initiation.
This document is a primary record of Epstein's status and condition in custody shortly before his death.
